statements: SELECT * FROM InsuranceAgents WHERE agent_id = 1;
SELECT agent_name, hire_date FROM InsuranceAgents WHERE performance_score > 4.0;
SELECT agent_name, incentive_scheme, supervisor_id FROM InsuranceAgents ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM InsuranceAgents WHERE supervisor_id IS NULL;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, performance_score FROM InsuranceAgents WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM InsuranceAgents WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT agent_name, hire_date FROM InsuranceAgents ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT agent_name, performance_score FROM InsuranceAgents WHERE incentive_scheme = 'Gold' ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT agent_name, supervisor_id, hire_date FROM InsuranceAgents WHERE supervisor_id IS NULL;
SELECT agent_name, hire_date FROM InsuranceAgents WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM insurance_agents;
SELECT agent_id, name, region FROM insurance_agents WHERE performance_score > 8.0;
SELECT name, performance_score FROM insurance_agents WHERE region = 'East';
SELECT * FROM incentive_schemes WHERE bonus_amount > 500.00;
SELECT scheme_id, bonus_amount FROM incentive_schemes WHERE agent_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM insurance_agents ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM insurance_agents WHERE region = 'West' AND performance_score > 8.0;
SELECT agent_id, name, region FROM insurance_agents WHERE performance_score BETWEEN 7.0 AND 9.0 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT i.agent_id, i.bonus_amount, a.name FROM incentive_schemes i JOIN insurance_agents a ON i.agent_id = a.agent_id WHERE i.bonus_amount > 5000 ORDER BY i.bonus_amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(performance_score) as avg_score, region FROM insurance_agents GROUP BY region HAVING AVG(performance_score) > 7.5 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM agents;
SELECT agent_name, agent_location FROM agents WHERE agent_performance_rating > 4.5;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, agent_location FROM agents ORDER BY agent_id DESC;
SELECT agent_name, agent_performance_rating FROM agents WHERE agent_performance_rating < 3.0 ORDER BY agent_id ASC;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, performance_date FROM agents JOIN agent_performance ON agents.agent_id = agent_performance.agent_id;
SELECT * FROM agents;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name FROM agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT agent_id, agent_location FROM agents WHERE agent_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM incentives WHERE incentive_type = 'Sales';
SELECT agent_id, performance_date, performance_score FROM agent_performance ORDER BY performance_score DESC, performance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM agents;
SELECT name, email FROM agents WHERE agent_id = 1;
SELECT scheme_name, incentive_amount FROM incentive_schemes WHERE incentive_amount > 100;
SELECT metric_id, metric_name FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY metric_date DESC;
SELECT agent_id, COUNT(metric_id) AS metric_count FROM agent_performance_mapping GROUP BY agent_id HAVING metric_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM agents ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT agent_id, name, email FROM agents WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_date DESC;
SELECT agents.name, performance_metrics.metric_name, performance_metrics.metric_value FROM agents JOIN performance_metrics ON agents.agent_id = performance_metrics.agent_id;

SELECT agents.name, incentive_schemes.scheme_name, incentive_amount FROM agents JOIN incentive_schemes JOIN agent_performance_mapping ON agents.agent_id = agent_performance_mapping.agent_id AND incentive_schemes.scheme_id = agent_performance_mapping.scheme_id;
SELECT * FROM agents;
SELECT agent_name, hire_date FROM agents WHERE territory='East';
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, hire_date FROM agents ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT agent_name, territory FROM agents WHERE hire_date>'2021-01-01';
SELECT agent_id, hire_date FROM agents WHERE agent_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM agents;
SELECT agent_name, hire_date FROM agents ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, territory FROM agents WHERE territory='East';
SELECT agent_name, policy_amount, policy_start_date FROM agents JOIN policies ON agents.agent_id = policies.agent_id;
SELECT agent_name, policy_type, sales_amount FROM agents JOIN performance ON agents.agent_id = performance.agent_id;
